summary: New perk branching off from Deadly Bash that allows you to shield bash the target, knocking them down.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Forceful Bash perk[/b][/u]

I'm not sure if this has been done before? Did a search with "Bash" and other words, didn't find anything similar. Sorry if there is.

[u][b]Description[/b][/u]

Branching off from Deadly Bash, Forceful Bash allows you to knock-back someone or something with or without a shield. Even works when bashing with a bow. The prerequisites for the perk is Deadly Bash, and 60 in Block. Have a look at the screenshot., or the vid.

That's all really. All it is is the Werewolf running power attack that knocks targets down, which I just put into perk form.

If you want to cheat the perk, type [u]help forceful[/u]. The code is = xx000D62. Where the xx is the number location of where you put the mod in the load order.

[line]

There's three versions to choose from.

1: The main file, the knockdown effect is strong and enemies will go flying. Not very realistic but it's there if anyone wants it.

2: Optional version one, the knockdown effect is a lot weaker and I consider this the best one. They get knocked off their feet but is not as strong as the main file.

3: Optional version two, in this version enemies will simply fall to the ground without ever leaving it.

[line]

If you want a kicking animation to it instead, have a look at [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44666//?]this mod.[/url]

SkyRe compatible version by Rudi91 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55857/?]here.[/url]


[u]Un/Install[/u]

Use NMM, I don't use it but it should work ok. To install manually put the esp. file into the data folder.

To uninstall, move or delete it.


[u]Credits[/u]

Bethesda
Nexus
author: Borjoyzee
